net.heroicefforts.viable.android.rep
Interface IssueResource

All Known Implementing Classes:
ITIssueResource, JIRAIssueResource, NullIssueResource, TypePriorityStateResource
public interface IssueResource

This interface represents well-defined states of issues in the issue repository.

Author:
jevans

Method Summary
 CharSequence getDescription(android.content.Context ctx)
          Returns a description of this state.
 android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getIcon(android.content.Context ctx)
          Returns an icon representing this state.
 CharSequence getName(android.content.Context ctx)
          Returns the descriptive name of the state.
 CharSequence getPriorityText(Issue issue)
          Returns the priority display value for the issue.
 CharSequence getStateText(Issue issue)
          Returns the status display value for the issue.
 CharSequence getTypeText(Issue issue)
          Returns the type display value for the issue.
 void setState(Issue issue)
          Initialize the issue with this state.
